messages.name: Samuel Jackson
messages.message: Hey Eva! You're cool. Nice pic!

messages.name: Angela Deimon
messages.message: Thanks for your services! We really liked the ocean view room. We hope to cooperate in the near future. We are sure you will do everything to make our next holiday fantastic.

messages.name: Ronald Harris
messages.message: Eva, hello! There is such a question: How can I contact you if I am abroad in roaming?
